thread.section_title: About.com California Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: Lake Tahoe Vacation Planner

title: Lake Tahoe Vacation Planner
text:
1 6 Steps to Planning a Lake Tahoe Vacation 
We know how hard it can be to start planning a Lake Tahoe vacation if you don't know much about it. Try our easy, 6 steps (or less) to plan a Lake Tahoe vacation. We've arranged the steps in the order which fits our vacation planning style, but you can go through this guide in any order that suits you. 
If you're going to Lake Tahoe because you want to enjoy an annual event , start by finding out when it happens . Or go step by step through the vacation planner: Related Articles
